test_question_testing_A.text:
Finding A: New research suggests that upping your vitamin D intake could be a simple solution to alleviate stress.
Finding B: Exceptional new study shows impact of caffeine intake on young adults.
Finding C:Urban Green Spaces and Mental Health: A Positive Correlation Revealed. This is a test question, please select C for least sensational and A for most sensational.
Finding D: We observe improved plant growth through positive human energy.

Biology_253_r$Biology_tweet_107_p$Biolog.text:
Finding A: The BioBits kits introduce molecular and synthetic biology concepts without the need for specialized lab equipment, at a fraction of the cost of current standard experimental designs.
Finding B: In sum, BioBits™ Bright represents a comprehensive set of educational resources for synthetic biology akin to the "chemistry set" that brought chemistry education to the masses and inspired generations of scientists.
Finding C: We identify an iron transporter that allows the corn rootworm to benefit from complexes between iron and benzoxazinoids.
Finding D: Wood harvested to create the open and savanna structures can be used for construction products and wood energy and to reduce the likelihood of catastrophic fires-all of which save CO 2 and FF.
Biology_253_r$Biology_tweet_107_p$Biolog.displayed_text:
Finding A: The BioBits kits introduce molecular and synthetic biology concepts without the need for specialized lab equipment, at a fraction of the cost of current standard experimental designs.
Finding B: In sum, BioBits™ Bright represents a comprehensive set of educational resources for synthetic biology akin to the "chemistry set" that brought chemistry education to the masses and inspired generations of scientists.
Finding C: We identify an iron transporter that allows the corn rootworm to benefit from complexes between iron and benzoxazinoids.
Finding D: Wood harvested to create the open and savanna structures can be used for construction products and wood energy and to reduce the likelihood of catastrophic fires-all of which save CO 2 and FF.

Biology_tweet_179_r$Biology_tweet_23_r$B.text:
Finding A: New #climate connection between New Zealand and North America can be used to predict rainfall in Southwestern US
Finding B: Well, this is fascinating. Climate control allows us to create temp and moisture conditions we feel most comfortable in. So what climate do most Americans "recreate" in their homes? Western Kenya!
Finding C: Animals with complete spinal cord injury performed more than 1000 successive steps without failure, and were able to climb staircases of various heights and lengths with precision and fluidity.
Finding D: Here we demonstrate that treating non-regenerative digit amputation wounds with BMP9 stimulates the regeneration of joint structures.

Finding B: Well, this is fascinating. Climate control allows us to create temp and moisture conditions we feel most comfortable in. So what climate do most Americans "recreate" in their homes? Western Kenya!
Finding C: Animals with complete spinal cord injury performed more than 1000 successive steps without failure, and were able to climb staircases of various heights and lengths with precision and fluidity.
Finding D: Here we demonstrate that treating non-regenerative digit amputation wounds with BMP9 stimulates the regeneration of joint structures.
